sources.title: [PDF] Analysis of Non-Performing Loans in PT. Bank Rakyat Indonesia ...
sources.snippet: Banks in general, in carrying out their operations to obtain business results, are always faced with a risk. One of the risks experienced by a bank is the large ratio of non-performing loans or what is called Non-Performing Loans/NPLs. Based on Bank Indonesia regulations, a bank has a dangerous potential if the bank has an NPL ratio of more than 5%. This study aims to analyze the level of non ...
